Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: worldstate_picker
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Manuel Warum
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: Lets the user pick and load a world state from the ICMM and OOI-WSR (Objects of Interest World State Repository). This widget also loads all associated data, such as all OOIs associated with the selected world state and what types of OOIs are known to the system.

Preference.name: polling
Preference.description: Time in seconds between polling for new world states. Use 0 or less to disable.
Preference.label: Poll interval

InputEndpoint.name: load_simulation
InputEndpoint.label: Simulation
InputEndpoint.description: The world state you want to load automatically

InputEndpoint.name: load_worldstate
InputEndpoint.label: World State
InputEndpoint.description: The world state you want to load automatically

OutputEndpoint.name: simulation
OutputEndpoint.label: Simulation
OutputEndpoint.description: The simulation selected by the user

OutputEndpoint.name: worldstate
OutputEndpoint.label: World State
OutputEndpoint.description: The world state selected by the user

OutputEndpoint.name: oois
OutputEndpoint.label: OOIs
OutputEndpoint.description: Objects of Interest for the given World State
